text.content:
Stupored

  • Stupored creatures have their minds tangled and forgetful. The stupored creature cannot take non-standard actions, such as those given by class or racial abilities—minor actions, reactions, etc. are unaffected. These standard actions cannot be modified or improved by other abilities, such as how the attack action is modified by sneak attack, multi-attack, etc.
  • In addition, they lose spell concentration, cannot cast spells, and have disadvantage on Presence (Save) checks.
